Ireland seeking review of EU-Israel agreement over rights concernsIreland is in talks with other EU members who want a review of the EU-Israel Association Agreement on the basis that Israel may be breaching the agreement's human rights clause, Prime Minister Leo Varadkar told reporters in Brussels on Thursday. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 17:11:43 GMT RUWXJCB3WRMJREOZDDP4IGVYJE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ireland-seeking-review-eu-israel-agreement-over-rights-concerns-2024-02-01/Reuters世界欧洲
Tunisian opposition leader Ghannouchi sentenced to three years in prisonA Tunisian judge on Thursday sentenced opposition leader Rached Ghannouchi, a fierce critic of President Kais Saied, to three year in prison on charges of accepting external financing, his lawyer Monia Bouali told Reuters. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 16:57:29 GMT HTTGT2HD3ROCZE47GM77IYW7IE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/tunisian-opposition-leader-ghannouchi-sentenced-third-years-prison-2024-02-01/Reuters世界中东
Saudi Arabia has not yet joined BRICS - Saudi official sourceSaudi Arabia is still considering an invitation to become a member of the BRICS bloc of countries after being asked to join by the group last year, a Saudi official source told Reuters. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 16:49:15 GMT FWH3ORE4PBJRHDEKEND7PVIB2U https://www.reuters.com/world/saudi-arabia-has-not-yet-joined-brics-saudi-official-source-2024-02-01/Reuters世界
Gaza cobblers work by roadsides to mend shoes of displacedWith Gaza largely cut off by Israel's war with Hamas, most of the population homeless and destitute, and with few new goods arriving in the Palestinian enclave, cobblers are busy repairing shoes for people unable to replace them. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 16:44:38 GMT 4QXKFA3THJIVHM3KQQB5ACC2IA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/gaza-cobblers-work-by-roadsides-mend-shoes-displaced-2024-02-01/Saleh Salem世界中东
Migrant arrivals to Spain's Canaries jump by over 1,000% in JanuaryThe number of migrants from West Africa who braved the sea in fragile boats to reach Spain's Canary Islands jumped more than 1,000% in January from a year ago, data released by the country's interior ministry on Thursday showed. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 16:34:33 GMT 4AFCJ4LKRRMLPGOL7ACRTI5MUM https://www.reuters.com/world/migrant-arrivals-spains-canaries-jump-by-over-1000-january-2024-02-01/Reuters世界
UK Deputy PM says strikes weakening Houthis, won't send troops into YemenBritain will not send ground troops into combat against Houthi militants in Yemen, Deputy Prime Minister Oliver Dowden said on Thursday, adding that air strikes had weakened the Iran-backed group. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 16:30:02 GMT RDRR5OGCTVOBRHDM5YSNU77ACI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/uk-deputy-pm-says-strikes-weakening-houthis-wont-send-troops-into-yemen-2024-02-01/Alexander Cornwell世界中东
Russia has no plans to deploy nuclear arms beyond Belarus, says deputy ministerRussia will not deploy nuclear weapons abroad except in its ally Belarus but will find ways to counter any deployment of U.S. tactical nuclear weapons in Britain, the deputy minister in charge of arms control said on Thursday. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 16:01:34 GMT C7O2GLZFYZN6FBBA66WELYNREU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-has-no-plans-deploy-nuclear-arms-beyond-belarus-says-deputy-minister-2024-02-01/Dmitry Antonov, Guy Faulconbridge世界欧洲
Italy's Meloni urges swift trial for Italian activist held in HungaryThe Italian anti-fascist activist held in Hungary for assaulting far-right militants should be granted a quick trial, Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni said on Thursday, wading into a controversy that is souring relations between Rome and Budapest. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 15:59:07 GMT B5RMRFBDEJNWNI2VUY22XCNMDU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/italys-meloni-urges-swift-trial-italian-activist-held-hungary-2024-02-01/Reuters世界欧洲
Armed man takes P&G factory staff hostage in Turkey -mediaAn armed man took staff hostage at a Procter & Gamble factory in northwestern Turkey on Thursday in an apparent protest against Israel's military campaign in Gaza, the Demiroren News Agency reported. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 15:09:53 GMT MWMB663ITJL6VIXAA6P4NOFFYE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/pg-factory-staff-taken-hostage-turkey-media-2024-02-01/Reuters世界中东
Biden issues order targeting Jewish settler violence in West BankU.S. President Joe Biden issued an executive order on Thursday that aims to punish Jewish settlers who attack Palestinians in the occupied West Bank following the Oct. 7 Hamas attack on southern Israel. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 14:37:09 GMT Z2KBPLKOZFJNBPJTBH6OFR7OVY https://www.reuters.com/world/biden-issue-order-targeting-jewish-settler-violence-wbank-politico-2024-02-01/Steve Holland, Susan Heavey, Daphne Psaledakis世界
Clashes erupt at Greek protest against education reformGreek police briefly clashed with masked protesters waving red flags on wooden poles outside parliament on Thursday during demonstrations against plans to let foreign private universities operate in the country. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 14:31:27 GMT HB6S6FVTYFKRNMT4F435XEG6MM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/clashes-erupt-greek-protest-against-education-reform-2024-02-01/Reuters世界欧洲
